item.title: Starting with React
item.description:
Found a couple of interesting things about how to do more with React and Flux, thought i’d share them.
This goes through the work flow of building an app with the aforementioned lib and pattern and the other explains rather simply the approach to building apps with Flux.
I like React, i find it, overall, a bit less of a hassle to understand than Ember so i will attempt to start getting more and more familiar with it in my pursuit to have a broader knowledge about both frontend and backend.
I never was a fan of javascript, but now i’m a ventilator.
